title: 2005 to 2020 local authority greenhouse gas emissions
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
datasetNotes: On landing page, navigate to the csv file - ‘2005 to 2020 local authority greenhouse gas emissions dataset’
notes: CO2 emissions now included in the regional GHG publication. Prior to the 2005 to 2020 publication the statistics covered emissions of CO2 only.
